aboutDescription: LayerCSS is a CSS-based design language that introduces advanced features to facilitate the creation of modular, reusable, and maintainable styles.
footerText: Â© 2025 LayerCSS. All rights reserved. Apache 2.0 License.

features.globalVariables: Global and Local Variables: Define reusable values across the project or within specific blocks.
features.nestedBlocks: Nested Blocks: Write styles hierarchically to improve readability and reduce selector repetition.
features.layers: Layers (@layer): Organize styles into logical sections like base, components, or utilities.
features.comments: Structured Comments: Supports single-line (//) and multi-line (/* ... */) comments.
features.animations: Support for Animations and Keyframes: Create dynamic visual effects easily.

philosophy.modularity: Modularity: Divide your styles into logical sections.
philosophy.reusability: Reusability: Define values once and use them in multiple places.
philosophy.maintainability: Ease of maintenance: Change a value in one place and affect the entire project.

comparison.title: Advantages Over Similar Projects
comparison.simplicity: Simplicity: Easier to learn and use than Sass or Less.
comparison.lightweight: Lightweight: No complex configurations or additional tools required.
comparison.compatibility: Compatibility: The generated CSS is fully compatible with modern browsers.
